PARSE_DASHBOARD_APP_ID.description: The unique identifier for your app.

PARSE_DASHBOARD_MASTER_KEY.description: The key that overrides all permissions.

PARSE_DASHBOARD_SERVER_URL.description: URL to connect to your parse-hipaa or parse-server instance

PARSE_DASHBOARD_GRAPHQL_SERVER_URL.description: URL to connect to your parse-hipaa or parse-server instance (your server's URL/graphql)

PARSE_DASHBOARD_USER_ID.description: Specify the user password to connect with.

PARSE_DASHBOARD_USER_PASSWORD.description: Specify the user password to connect with. Can use a site to hash your password, https://bcrypt-generator.com.

PARSE_DASHBOARD_COOKIE_SESSION_SECRET.description: A constant cookie session for dashboard.

MOUNT_PATH.description: The mount path should be the same as the docker name.
